product_name: Brooks Essential Run Jacket II - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A lightweight essential for training in cold, wet weather, the Brooks Essential Run Jacket II offers weather-resistant fabric for excellent protection during outdoor runs. Extremely lightweight polyester fabric blocks wind and resists light precipitation thanks to a Durable Water Repellent finish. Rear vents increase breathability to help keep you dry. Internal pocket protects contents from moisture and is sized to fit a music player like a smartphone or dedicated media player; earphone port routes the cord. Reflective detailing increases your visibility to motorists in low light and can be seen from any angle. Zippered side pockets; adjustable waist. Sized right for running, the semifitted Brooks Essential Run Jacket II is not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: A lightweight essential for training in cold, wet weather, the Brooks Essential Run Jacket II offers weather-resistant fabric for excellent protection during outdoor runs.
